column2: b'Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn: Episode EX - 100 Years of Solitude'

b"Recap of Mobile Suit Gundam, Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam, Mobile Suit Gundam ZZ and Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack focusing on Newtype and Zeonism ideals told before UC episode 7.\n\nIncluded as a bonus on a Volume 7 Blu-ray release of the Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn OVA."
[b'Mobile Suit Gundam', b'Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam', b'Mobile Suit Gundam ZZ', b"Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack", b'Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn']
